column1: Smoque BBQ////So that was Saturday. Then Tuesday rolls around
column2: and my boyfriend offers to pick up Smoque again for dinner. BBQ and Lost? Who can say no. This time
column3: I got the pulled pork sandwich and a side of the sausage.We also split another half slab of St. Louis ribs. I loved the bread that it came on
column4: I felt that it didn't soak up all of the bbq sauce and let it marinate on down into the meat. The sausage was wonderfully smokey with a hint of spice in the background. I wish it was a little spicier
column5: but I think that's because I love hot links.
